SENTRY_PART_INST_COUNT_ = #{sentryPartInstanceCount, jdbcType=INTEGER},
TENANT_ID_ = #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID_ = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and REV_ = #{revision, jdbcType=INTEGER}
